Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-1744 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-1744 affecting package ceph for versions less than 16.2.10-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ceph is earlier than 16.2.10-7, affected by CVE-2025-1744
